Dad gets 1/3 if the deceased didn\'t leave child and grandchild (An Nisa : 11)
Dad gets 1/6 if the deceased left child or grandchild (An Nisa : 11)
Mom gets 1/3 if the deceased didn\'t leave child, child of son, and number of sibling is less than two (An Nisa : 11)
Mom gets 1/6 if the deceased left child, child of son, or number of sibling is more than one (An Nisa : 11)
Husband gets 1/2 if the deceased didn\'t left child and child of son (An Nisa : 12)
Husband gets 1/4 if the deceased left child or child of son (An Nisa : 12)
Wives get 1/4 if the deceased didn\'t leave child and child of son. Divided equally if more than one (An Nisa : 12)
Wives get 1/8 if the deceased left child or child of son. Divided equally if more than one (An Nisa : 12)
Daughter gets 1/2 if alone and the deceased didn\'t leave son (An Nisa : 11)
Daughters get 2/3 if more than one and the deceased didn\'t leave son. Divided equally (An Nisa : 11)
Full sister gets 1/2 if alone, kalalah, and the deceased didn\'t leave full brother, daughter, and daughter of son (An Nisa : 176)
Full sisters get 2/3 if more than one, kalalah, and the deceased didn\'t leave full brother, daughter, and daughter of son. (An Nisa : 176)
Paternal sister gets 1/2 if alone, kalalah, and the deceased didn\'t leave daughter, daughter of son, full brother, full sister, and paternal brother.
Paternal sisters get 2/3 if more than one, kalalah, and the deceased didn\'t leave daughter, daughter of son, full brother, full sister, and paternal brother.
Paternal sisters get 1/6 if kalalah, the deceased left only a full sister, and the deceased didn\'t leave full brother and paternal brother
Maternal siblings get 1/3 if more than one and kalalah. Divided equally. (An Nisa : 12)
Maternal sibling gets 1/6 if alone and kalalah. (An Nisa : 12)
Dad of dad gets 1/6 if the deceased didn\'t leave dad, child, and child of son
Grandmas get 1/6 if the deceased left child, child of son, or number of sibling is more than one. Divided equally if more than one
Daughter of son gets 1/2 if alone and the deceased didn\'t leave daughter and son of son
Daughter of son gets 1/6 if the deceased left a daughter and the deceased did\'t leave son of son
Daughters of sons get 2/3 if more than one and the deceased didn\'t leave daughter and son of son. Divided equally.
Mom gets special amount (Umar\'s Fatwa). If the deceased left dad and spouse, but didn\'t leave offspring, mom gets 1/3 of the remaining of the legacy after it\'s shared to spouse.
Son get ashabah. Divided equally\n. If there is also daughter, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Son get 2x more than daughter)
If deceased left son and daughter, they get ashabah, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Son get 2x more than daughter)
Sons of sons get ashabah. Divided equally\n. If there is also daughters of sons, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Sons of sons get 2x more than daughters of sons)
Dad gets ashabah if the deceased didn\'t leave son and son of son.
If deceased left son of son and daughter of son, they get ashabah, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Sons of sons get 2x more than daughters of sons)
Full brothers get ashabah. Divided equally\n. If there is also full sister, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Full brothers get 2x more than full sisters)
If deceased left full brother and full sister, they get ashabah, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Full brothers get 2x more than full sisters)
Paternal brothers get ashabah. Divided equally\n. If there is also paternal sister, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Paternal brothers get 2x more than paternal sisters)
If deceased left paternal brother and paternal sister, they get ashabah, divided with ratio 2:1\n. (Paternal brothers get 2x more than paternal sisters)
